author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-246: The EntityLinkingEngine now ranks Entity that exact match the selected text of the Text annotations first.
This is done by taking the highest rank of all matching Entities and adding the rank of the Entity with an exact match.
Note that Entities that do not exactly match are not filtered.
